modmenu.descriptionTranslation.ridehud: Shows advanced information about ridable animals.
config.ridehud.display_mode.comment.0: How to display the speed and jump statistics.
config.ridehud.display_mode.comment.1: Maximum: Show the maximum speed and jump height.
config.ridehud.display_mode.comment.2: Current: Show the current speed and jump height.
config.ridehud.display_text.comment: If stats should also be displayed in text form.
config.ridehud.bar_offset.comment: Offsets of the speed and jump bars in the vertical direction.
config.ridehud.heart_offset.comment: Offsets of the additional hearts in the vertical direction.
